February 1818 – February 20, 1895) was an African-American social reformer, abolitionist, orator, writer, and statesman.", "dateLastCrawled": "2018-04-17T00:54:00.0000000Z", "richCaption": {"_type": "StructuredValue\/SectionData", "sections": [{"_type": "StructuredValue\/SimpleSection", "name": "Overview", "siteName": "en.wikipedia.org", "description": "Frederick Douglass was an African-American social reformer, abolitionist, orator, writer, and statesman.
